refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Returns &true; if every character in text is an uppercase letter in the current locale.

example.title: A ctype_upper example (using the default locale)
example.programlisting:
<?php
$strings = array('AKLWC139', 'LMNSDO', 'akwSKWsm');
foreach ($strings as $testcase) {
    if (ctype_upper($testcase)) {
        echo "The string $testcase consists of all uppercase letters.\n";
    } else {
        echo "The string $testcase does not consist of all uppercase letters.\n";
    }
}
?>
example.screen: The string AKLWC139 does not consist of all uppercase letters. The string LMNSDO consists of all uppercase letters. The string akwSKWsm does not consist of all uppercase letters.

refsect1.para: See also ctype_alpha, ctype_lower, and setlocale.
